stages.name: Nursery
stages.description: Seed germination and seedling growth in nursery beds

critical_activities.task: Scout for leaf folder and thrips

stages.name: Transplanting
stages.description: Transfer 21-day old seedlings to main field

critical_activities.task: Level field for uniform water distribution

stages.name: Flowering

critical_activities.task: Avoid any pesticide spraying during peak flowering

stages.water_management: Continuous 5 cm - CRITICAL for grain setting

critical_activities.task: Spray Propiconazole if sheath blight severe
Dry grains to 14% moisture for storage
Clean and store in dry place
Apply Urea 30 kg/acre as first dose
Scout for Jassids and Aphids weekly
Critical irrigation - do not allow stress
Irrigate at critical boll development stage
Scout for Pink Bollworm rosette flowers
Keep cotton dry - avoid rain damage
Destroy crop residues to prevent pink bollworm
Spray Emamectin benzoate if FAW found
Check kernel milk line - harvest at 25% moisture
Apply basal fertilizer if not applied
Maintain soil moisture for peg penetration
Spray Copper oxychloride for fruit rot
Harvest red chillies for dry chilli
Pick at breaker stage for long transport
Harvest at 75% maturity for distant markets
Harvest when pods turn straw color
Scout for shoot and fruit borer
Soak seeds in water before sowing
First irrigation at CRI stage (18-21 DAS)
Harvest when grain hard and golden
Spray for pod borer if needed
Earthing up to prevent green shoulders
Apply basal fertilizer if not applied
Maintain soil moisture for peg penetration
